refnamediv.refpurpose: Clean (erase) the output buffer and turn off output buffering

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function discards the contents of the topmost output buffer and turns off this output buffering. It returns true when it successfully discarded one buffer and false otherwide. Reasons for failure are first that you called the function without an active buffer or that for some reason a buffer could not be deleted (possible for special buffer).
See also ob_start, ob_clean and ob_end_flush.

The following example shows an easy way to get rid of all output buffers:
ob_end_clean example
<?php while (@ob_end_clean()); ?>

note.simpara: If the function fails it generates an E_NOTICE.
The boolean return value was added in PHP 4.2.0.
